testsuite.name: Scenario: Test EMAIL mapping.

testcase.name: Given I set up the LTI consumer key and shared secret if not already done
And I am logged in as the default administrator
And I create custom field mappings
And I directly log out
When I launch random "basic-lti-launch-request" LTI request with role "Administrator" and outcome URL "" and document target "window"
Then I am on the LTI Mapping Page
When I click the 'System Homepage' mapping button
Then I am on the System Homepage
When I open the Search User page
Then I search for and validate LTI user
And I verify and close the LTI Page window
Then I am on the Test Harness page
When I restore the launched LTI Test Harness form
And I update LTI user fields
And I set random value for "custom_mapped_login" field
And I set random value for "custom_mapped_student_id" field
When I launch prepared "basic-lti-launch-request" LTI request with role "Instructor" and outcome URL "" and document target "window"
Then I am on the System Homepage
When I open the Search User page
Then I search for and validate LTI user
And I verify and close the LTI Page window
Then I am on the Test Harness page
When I close the LTI Test Harness leftover windows
And I directly log out
And I am logged in as the default administrator
And I am on the Field Mapping page
Then I delete all LTI field mappings.
classMethod

testsuite.system-out: Scenario: Test USER_NAME mapping. ?[90m# lti/FieldMapping.feature:21?[0m # Change mapped user information but keep the custom login ?[32mWhen ?[0m?[32mI restore the launched LTI Test Harness form?[0m ?[90m# TestHarnessSteps.restoreLaunchedTestHarnessForm()?[0m ?[32mAnd ?[0m?[32mI update LTI user fields?[0m ?[90m# TestHarnessSteps.updateUserFields()?[0m ?[32mAnd ?[0m?[32mI set random value for "?[0m?[32m?[1mcustom_mapped_email?[0m?[32m" email field?[0m ?[90m# TestHarnessSteps.setRandomValueForEmailField(String)?[0m ?[32mAnd ?[0m?[32mI set random value for "?[0m?[32m?[1mcustom_mapped_student_id?[0m?[32m" field?[0m ?[90m# TestHarnessSteps.setRandomValueForTextField(String)?[0m ?[32mWhen ?[0m?[32mI launch prepared "?[0m?[32m?[1mbasic-lti-launch-request?[0m?[32m" LTI request with role "?[0m?[32m?[1mInstructor?[0m?[32m" and outcome URL "?[0m?[32m?[1m?[0m?[32m" and document target "?[0m?[32m?[1mwindow?[0m?[32m"?[0m ?[90m# TestHarnessSteps.submitLtiRequest(String,String,String,String)?[0m ?[32mThen ?[0m?[32mI am on the System Homepage?[0m ?[90m# SystemHomepageSteps.assertSystemHomepage()?[0m ?[32mWhen ?[0m?[32mI open the Search User page?[0m ?[90m# SearchUserSteps.navigateToSearchUserPage()?[0m ?[32mThen ?[0m?[32mI search for and validate LTI user?[0m ?[90m# TestHarnessSteps.searchForUser()?[0m ?[32mAnd ?[0m?[32mI verify and close the LTI Page window?[0m ?[90m# LTIPageSteps.verifyAndCloseWindow()?[0m ?[32mThen ?[0m?[32mI am on the Test Harness page?[0m ?[90m# TestHarnessSteps.verifyTestHarnessPage()?[0m # Cleanup. Normal post-test logout doesn't work for LTI users, so we have to do it here. ?[32mWhen ?[0m?[32mI close the LTI Test Harness leftover windows?[0m ?[90m# TestHarnessSteps.closeLeftoverWindows()?[0m ?[32mAnd ?[0m?[32mI directly log out?[0m ?[90m# LoginSteps.directlyLogOut()?[0m ?[32mAnd ?[0m?[32mI am logged in as the default administrator?[0m ?[90m# LoginSteps.logInAsAdministrator()?[0m ?[32mAnd ?[0m?[32mI am on the Field Mapping page?[0m ?[90m# FieldMappingSteps.navigateToFieldMappingPage()?[0m ?[32mThen ?[0m?[32mI delete all LTI field mappings.?[0m ?[90m# FieldMappingSteps.deleteAllMappings()?[0m
